overview: Graduates will have achieved a professional level standard in vocal performance or repetiteur skills capable of meeting global demands.

For singers, this will include skills in acting, movement and other stagecraft skills as well as the lyric diction skills required for professional opera singing. Students are taught to realise feeling through not only the voice but subtle stage action.

Year 1: OR an elective selected from the Melbourne Conservatorium of Music.
Year 2: OR an elective selected from the Melbourne Conservatorium of Music.
